column4: hey guys, if anyone if good with kernel updating and grub, please see if you can answer my question, thanks. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=865545
run grub-install /dev/sda from the 32 bit to install on mbr
are you sure, will grub-install mess up stuff?

it will install grub from the 32 bit system that is getting updates onto the MBR.  The other sloution would be to mount the 64 bit systems / partition, and maunully copy the stanzas for your new kernel into it
